casebody.data:
CHARLES R. TOWNSEND, et al., Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. THE GLENS FALLS INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided November 29, 1873. Howard Ellis, for appellant. O. E. Bright, for respondents.

Opinion by Monell, J. Curtis and Sedgwick, JJ., concurred.

Action to recover upon a policy of insurance for a loss by fire of a stock of goods, etc.

Appeal from a judgment for plaintiffs.

Judgment affirmed.
